mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT `message`.`userId`,`message`.`goodsId`,`message`.`ortherId`,`user`.`userName`,`user`.`userImage`,`message`.`isShow`,`goods`.`goodsImage`,`message`.`isRead` FROM `message` INNER JOIN `user` INNER JOIN `goods` ON `message`.`ortherId`=`user`.`userId` AND `goods`.`goodsId`=`message`.`goodsId` WHERE `message`.`userId`=#{userId} AND `message`.`isShow`=1
